noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No.1266-2018 to designate 131 Farnham Avenue (The Macdonald House) (St. Paul’s, Ward 22) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE10.15 - Amendment of Designating By-law and Authority to Amend Existing Heritage Easement Agreement - 131 Farnham Avenue
CC20.18 - 131 Farnham Avenue and 45 Oaklands Avenue - Zoning By-law Amendment Application and Site Plan Application - Further Direction Required
Bylaw 1266-2018 - To amend By-law 10-77 of the former City of Toronto, being a by-law to designate the Macdonald House at 131 Farnham Avenue as being of architectural value and of historic interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act, R.S.O. 1990, Chapter 0.18 and 131 Farnham Avenue (The Macdonald House), City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-Law 1266-2018 - 131 Farnham Avenue
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
